mapper.update: update hotels set readcount = readcount + 1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hotels ORDER BY readcount DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_comments (id, hotelseq, content, wdate) VALUES (#{id},#{seq},#{content},now())
